properties.notes: Corner unit with southern exposure and partial ocean view.

inspection.summary: General pre-purchase inspection for a 2-bedroom condo unit. Overall in good condition with minor maintenance issues.

sections.name: Roof
sections.note: Roof is part of the strata responsibility; visually inspected from ground level and upper balcony.

observations.name: Moss growth along north edge
observations.description: Some moss accumulation visible on shaded sections. Recommend routine cleaning.

observations.name: Flashing sealant wear
observations.description: Sealant at flashing joints appears cracked; could lead to moisture intrusion over time.

sections.name: Electrical
sections.note: Panel located in entry hallway; 100A service with labeled breakers.

observations.name: Missing GFCI protection
observations.description: No GFCI outlets in kitchen or bathrooms. Recommend upgrading for safety.

sections.name: Plumbing
sections.note: Copper supply lines and ABS drains observed throughout.

observations.name: Slow bathroom drain
observations.description: Primary bathroom sink drains slowly, likely due to minor buildup.

media.caption: Sink with standing water after test

observations.name: Leaking shutoff valve
observations.description: Active leak observed at cold-water shutoff under kitchen sink.

sections.name: Interior
sections.note: All rooms inspected; general wear consistent with age.

observations.name: Cracked drywall at window corner
observations.description: Hairline crack noted at living room window corner, likely due to minor settling.
